landing.title: FarmQuest
landing.subtitle: Grow Smarter. Get Rewarded.
landing.description: Transform your farming practices through gamified learning. Complete quests, earn rewards, and build a sustainable future for Indian agriculture.
landing.platformDescription: Our platform combines the best of gaming mechanics with practical farming knowledge
landing.learningDescription: Master sustainable farming practices through interactive challenges and fun activities.
landing.personalizedDescription: Get custom farming missions tailored to your crops and local conditions.
landing.progressDescription: Monitor your sustainability journey with detailed analytics and achievements.
landing.communityDescription: Connect with fellow farmers, share tips, and celebrate successes together.

dashboard.keepGoing: Keep going! You're making great progress.

community.action3: shared a tip about crop rotation

quests.waterConservationDesc: Reduce water usage by 20% this week
quests.organicFertilizerDesc: Switch to organic fertilizer for one crop section

achievements.firstHarvestDesc: Successfully completed your first sustainable harvest
achievements.waterSaverDesc: Reduced water consumption by 15% last month

quests.questDescription: Choose from various farming challenges designed to improve your sustainability and earn rewards.
quests.uploadPhoto: Take a photo or upload an image

community.communityDescription: Connect with fellow farmers, share knowledge, and celebrate achievements together.
